profile.name: Issarapong Poesua
profile.description: Experienced iOS Application Development in Swift and Objective-C. DevOps with JenkinsCI and Fastlane. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) focused in Computer Engineering from King Mongkut's Institute of Technology Ladkrabang Thailand.

responsibilities.name: Undisclosed projects
responsibilities.description: this application lets users able to participate purchased treatments and activities on mobile.
details: Develops iOS application with MVVM, Coordinator, Functional, Delegate, Observable design pattern.
Set up and maintains CI/CD with Jenkins and fastlane, deploys to Fabric.
Designed Jenkins pipeline and Fastlane’s lanes to be reusable for branches and PR events on Git repository.
Unit tests, UI Tests with Quick and Nimble ( Inspired from RSpec ) above XCTests and XCUITests.
Related Apple’s Frameworks: Foundation, UIKit, AVFoundation, AVKit, LocalAuthentication.

responsibilities.name: Nimbl3 iOS Template
responsibilities.description: Application lets users able to participate purchased treatments and activities on mobile
details: Maintains template following current technology and company’s business flow for CI/CD.

responsibilities.name: TIP Insure
responsibilities.description: this application lets users buy insurance, check insurance and related insurance’s service like garages and hospitals
details: Developed iOS application with storyboard and MVVM design pattern.

responsibilities.name: ShopSpot
responsibilities.description: this lets users buy, sell stuffs and read articles on ShopSpot’s online marketplace.
details: As an intern iOS developer, I was assigned to learn how to start project from scratch and architecting project.

education.name: King Mongkut's Instute of Technology Ladkrabang

other_perks.title: iOS ConfSG 2016
other_perks.subtitle: Visitor Nanyang Polytechnic, Singapore
other_perks.detail: iOS Conf SG aims to bring the iOS developers in this region and the world together. The world’s top iOS developers, bloggers, book authors and trainers are coming together for 2 days. The participants can meet like-minded iOS developers, have fun, learn from one another and find opportunities for collaboration.

other_perks.title: Intro to Startup By KITS
other_perks.subtitle: Head of Organizer KMITL Innovation & Technology Startup, Thailand.
other_perks.detail: KITS Stands for KMITL Innovation & Technology Startup, community of KMITL's students that interesting in developing ideas, connections and abilities to launch the startup business.
